task.prompt: Kevin has a shoebox filled with toads.  Every day, Kevin feeds each toad 3 worms.  It takes Kevin 15 minutes to find each worm.  If it takes Kevin 6 hours to find enough worms to feed all of his toads, how many toads does Kevin have in his shoebox?
